mapper.sql: dtid, dtsex, dtnumber, dtsize, dtimg, dtname, dtfloor, dtno
mapper.insert: insert into dt_floor (dtid, dtsex, dtnumber, dtsize, dtimg, dtname, dtfloor, dtno) values (#{dtid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtfloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtno,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dt_floor
dtid,
dtsex,

dtfloor,
dtno,

mapper.update:
update dt_floor
dtsex = #{dtsex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dtnumber = #{dtnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dtsize = #{dtsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtimg = #{dtimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtname = #{dtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtfloor = #{dtfloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtno = #{dtno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dtid = #{dtid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dt_floor set dtsex = #{dtsex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dtnumber = #{dtnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dtsize = #{dtsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtimg = #{dtimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtname = #{dtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtfloor = #{dtfloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtno = #{dtno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dtid = #{dtid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from dt_floor
and dtsex = #{dtsex}
and dtnumber like concat("%",#{dtnumber},"%")
and dtsize like concat("%",#{dtsize},"%")
and dtname like concat("%",#{dtname},"%")
and dtfloor like concat("%",#{dtfloor},"%")
and dtno like concat("%",#{dtno},"%")
